name: Temperature 1
description:
Temperature 1 is a game where the player is placed in control of Richard Von Sun and seeks clues as to why global warming is a scam if everyone feels cold and hot.

Created By:

Danilo A. Del Busso

Guilherme Felipe de C. G. da Silva

Assets:

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/loop-house-in-a-forest

House: https://opengameart.org/content/interior-tileset-16x16

Character: https://kenney.nl/assets/sokoban
developers: Guilherme Felipe de C. G. da Silva
